p: The processes, including the evidence search strategy, the handover of information, and the data extraction template were initially piloted over 1 day using a fictitious Nipah virus outbreak scenario. This process mini-pilot was evaluated through feedback from all involved in the pilot at a conference meeting call. The feedback informed updates to the data extraction table and the handover processes. The final RRNA protocol was subsequently piloted fully over 5 days using a fictitious LF outbreak scenario.
